short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade Gmail. Install the missing button to just unsubscribe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop wasting your time hunting for unsubscribe links. Install this extension to add the missing unsubscribe button to Gmail. Click the button and we’ll find the fastest way for you to opt out. Oh, and your emails never leave Gmail – secure and private all the way.
